1011010101011000 1011110001111000 0 -> sum: 0111000111010000, cout: 1
0101001000110110 0011011100011100 1 -> sum: 1000100101010011, cout: 0
1101111101101011 0110110110110000 0 -> sum: 0100110100011011, cout: 1
0110000000111110 0101101000100001 0 -> sum: 1011101001011111, cout: 0
0011100010010101 1001000010000100 0 -> sum: 1100100100011001, cout: 0
0101111111100001 1100111010111110 0 -> sum: 0010111010011111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
